subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical fort was built by Rao Jodha?
question_hi: राव जोधा ने किस अभिषेक बनाया ?
explanation_en: Chittorgarh Fort was built by Rao Jodha.
explanation_hi: राव जोधा ने चीटरगढ़ किस्मत को बनाया।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rathore Rajput family ruled Jaipur?
question_hi: जापुर के राजपूत लोक क्या थे?
explanation_en: Dharam Singh Rathore was the ruler of Jaipur.
explanation_hi: धर्म सिंग रात्ते जापुर की सरकार है।
